summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1358, for the improvement of Seventh Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from Prospect Street to the north line of Union Lake Supplemental Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing all necessary bulkheads and retaining walls, under Ordinance No. 15006 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
